metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6293 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The uloc_acceptLanguageFromHTTP function in common/uloc.cpp inInternational Components for Unicode (ICU) through 57.1 for C/C++ does notensure that there is a '\0' character at the end of a certain temporaryarray, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a callwith a long httpAcceptLanguage argument.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6293` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libicu55 - 55.1-7ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icu package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.1-7ubuntu0.1').
